name: Aquaworld Resort Budapest
description: Aquaworld Resort Budapest wellness and family friendly hotel is offering services unique in Budapest: it has 309 rooms, the main building has standard rooms, junior suites, family rooms and apartments. Free, unlimited internet access (Wi-Fi) in the entire premises of the hotel, as well as free outdoor car park for over 1000 cars await the arriving guests. The complex houses a three-leveled Oriental Spa wellness and fitness centre for those longing for relaxation, Bongo Kids Club for the youngest visitors and one of Europes grandest indoor water theme parks, Aquaworld for the adventurous. Aquaworld is directly accessible from the hotel. The water amusement park offers unforgettable entertainment for every age group all year round. The suspension bridges, towers and pools surrounding the replica of Angkor Wat temple provide a breathtaking sight. Visitors are transformed into explorers and can feel as if theyve fallen into a new world: tropical atmosphere, suspension bridges, palm trees, whirlpool, mountain stream, 17 indoor and outdoor kiddy and amusement pools. Adventure and adrenalin rush is guaranteed with 11 different slides, surf pool, diving and floating balls. A playground, childrens pools, childrens play corner and the Bongo Kids Club with supervision await our youngest guests.iHotelier/iStay

name: Silver Garden
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a sauna and a seasonal outdoor pool, as well as a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and a stovetop. Other amenities include towels, an electric kettle, kitchenware and utensils, and a picnic area.Expedia

name: Akadémia Hotel
description: Located in Balatonfüred in the Veszprem Region, the property offers free entry to Balatonfüred Municipal Swimming Pool with access to swimming pool, sauna, hot tub and steam cabin. Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and is equipped with a TV. Akadémia Hotel features free WiFi throughout the property. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Free private parking is available on site. The hotel also offers bike hire. The nearest airport is Hévíz–Balaton Airport, 61 km from the property.

name: Hunguest Hotel Forrás
description: Hunguest Hotel Forrás in Szeged offers free limitless daily entry to the Napfényfürdő Aquapolis Szeged Spa Centre with adventure pools, 9 indoor and 4 outdoor slides, thermal baths, saunas, a steam bath and a salt cabin. This spa centre is set right next to the property and is reachable through a closed corridor. Free WiFi access is available throughout the hotel. Each accommodation unit comes with a balcony and air conditioning. Some of the accommodation units are equipped with an indoor or outdoor hot tub and several have a fireplace. Guests can enjoy a meal at the on-site restaurant. Hunguest Hotel Forrás also houses a bowling alley, a bar, billiard tables, a games room and a beauty area. The centre of Szeged can be reached in a 10-minute walk. The Votive Church is set 1.4 km from the property, while Szeged Train Station is 2.5 km away.

name: Piknik Wellness Hotel
description: Set in Siófok, 7.4 km from Bebo Aquapark, Piknik Wellness Hotel offers accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Offering a restaurant, the property also has a tennis court, as well as a sauna and a hot tub. Some units at the property feature a balcony with a garden view. Selected rooms also offer a kitchen with a fridge, an oven and a stovetop. Guests at the resort can enjoy a Full English/Irish breakfast. Piknik Wellness Hotel offers a spa centre. You can play billiards and table tennis at the accommodation, and the area is popular for cycling. Speaking German, English and Hungarian, staff are willing to help at the 24-hour front desk. Bella Stables and Animal Park is 14 km from Piknik Wellness Hotel, while Museum of Minerals is 4.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Hévíz–Balaton Airport, 89 km from the resort.

name: Greenfield Hotel Golf & Spa
description: Greenfield Hotel Golf & Spa Superior is located in Bük, in the western corner of the country, in the heart of the thermal region famous for its healing springs. The four-star superior rated hotel is surrounded by a beautiful maintained 18-hole championship golf course and 100 hectares of parkland. Greenfield Hotel offers a unique combination of wellness and golf hotels providing an idyllic ambience. Our interiors have been revitalized and our rooms have a new, modern look. Our spa and sauna world has been renewed, ensuring the ultimate relaxation experience. The Greenfield Hotel Golf & Spa’s the services of our 3500 sqm large exclusive wellness and spa world and cleanse your body and soul. The hotel has one heated outdoor pool and 5 indoor pools - adventure pool, 2 indoor pools filled with our own medicinal water, 20 meter long sport pool and a baby pool with slide and water adventure element. From December 2021 Finnish sauna, bio and light sauna, aroma sauna, salt room with salt sand box, ice fountain, plunge pool, experience shower offer our guests relaxation and pampering. Our beauty salon provides the services of a cosmetics salon. We have also expanded our services to make our guests' stay even more enjoyable, with the creation of our exclusive Spa & Harmony wellness area (with surcharge) and a 10-metre high tower slide, which can be used 365 days a year. And don't forget to have fun while you relax! In the Chill&Fun Entertainment Centre, everyone will find their favourite entertainment, while the Play&Fun playroom for the kids guarantees a playful and fun-filled experience.
